attributes.action: Stop/reduce putting plastic in the ocean.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to discuss it as it is a major issue that causes many lives to be destroyed. It also affects many marine life and flying creatures while hunting. It is imperative the Government does something as soon as possible before it gets worse.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to reduce the amount of plastic being put in the ocean as there is a lot of plastic being discarded and creating 'plastic oceans.' Destroying people and animals lives.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to reduce the amount of plastic pollution
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign these petitions

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331061
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551544
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551778
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311520
